scripts.test-travis: node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks -u exports test.js
scripts.lint: npm run lint-api && npm run lint-test && npm run lint-script && npm run lint-style
scripts.lint-style: node_modules/.bin/jscs index.js script/scrape-data.js script/build-data.js script/build-support.js test.js --reporter=inline
scripts.make: npm run lint && npm run coverage
scripts.build: npm run scrape-data && npm run build-data && npm run build-support
